WebSound – £12/year 512MB KVM and more in Las Vegas, USA

exclusive, kvm, las vegas, USA, websound.co.uk July 30, 2015 @ 1:00 am, by Jonathan Tan

Callum, from WebSound, is back with another set of offers for the LowEndBox community. They were first featured about 3 months ago, and they are back with another exclusive promotion. This time they are offering double RAM and a 20% discount from their regular plans. A limited storage offer is also included.

Similar to their first feature, all plans utilize KVM virtualization and are located at the FiberHub datacenter in Las Vegas, USA. This location includes free DDoS Protection of up to 10Gbps/2Mpps on all packages as standard.

Host nodes for this offer has minimum specification of Dual Intel E5-2620v2 Processors, 128GB RAM and 4 x 4TB HDD Drives in hardware RAID 10 with write cache and BBU. Since the location is in Las Vegas, the latency should be good for many Asian countries.

256MB KVM

  • 256MB RAM (512MB RAM with promotional code)
  • 256MB SWAP
  • 1x CPU Core
  • 10GB RAID 10 HDD space
  • 1TB Monthly Bandwidth
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • KVM/Virtualizor
  • Coupon: LEBDR07
  • £12.00/year (~$18.66)
  • Order here
512MB KVM

  • 512MB RAM (1GB RAM with promotional code)
  • 512MB SWAP
  • 2x CPU Core
  • 20GB RAID 10 HDD space
  • 2TB Monthly Bandwidth
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • KVM/Virtualizor
  • Coupon: LEBDR07
  • £2.50/month (~$3.11)
  • Order here
1GB KVM

  • 1GB RAM (2GB RAM with promotional code)
  • 512MB SWAP
  • 2x CPU Core
  • 40GB RAID 10 HDD space
  • 3TB Monthly Bandwidth
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • KVM/Virtualizor
  • Coupon: LEBDR07
  • £4.00/month (~$6.22)
  • Order here

Storage Offer

  • 512MB RAM
  • 256MB SWAP
  • 2x CPU Core
  • 100GB RAID 10 HDD space
  • 3TB Monthly Bandwidth
  • 1Gbps uplink
  • 1x IPv4
  • KVM/Virtualizor
  • £18.00/year (~$27.99)
  • Order here

WebSound has been operating since September 2013, catering mainly for the Gaming industry, while also offering other services such as Web Hosting, Reseller Hosting, Domain Names and Voice Services. They have recently expanded to offer VPS solutions to their clients. WebSound is registered as a sole trader in the UK, so they don’t have a company number. however, they are registered under the EU VAT MOSS scheme (GB 203 0289 55). Their domain was created last 2012 and their WHOIS information is public. Feedback seems to tell that ticket responses are fast. We would love to hear more comments from readers who tried their service.

WebSound accepts payments using PayPal and debit/credit cards via Stripe. Please note that all prices exclude VAT which is charged to EU clients at the rate of their country of residence, UK clients are not charged VAT at this time, however. Their website states that they offer a 7 day money back guarantee only on the first purchase of service. Some of prohibited activities on their servers includes: Pirated/Cracked Software, Spam E-Mail, child pornography, and others. As always, kindly read all their legal documents carefully before making any purchase. Here is their Terms of Service, Acceptable Use Policy, and Privacy Policy.
